pages.text: Miniature Schnauzers were originally bred for hunting rats.$(br2)Standing at roughly half a block tall, these hard-working dogs come in three different coats.
These dogs are found most commonly in birch and flower forests. They can also be found in some jungles, and more rarely in deserts.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Rabbit Treat.
